theAya:AyaCamera.NAME: Aya's Camera
DESCRIPTIONS: Select #b1 card in your hand and generate #b1 #ySnapshot of it. NL #gUsable #gonce #gper #gcombat.

theAya:AyaNote.NAME: Aya's Notebook
theAya:AyaNote.FLAVOR: A tengu notebook gathering innumerable photographs and handwritten notes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#f57330]Aya's[] [#f57330]Camera[]. Select #b1 card in your hand and generate #b1 #ySnapshot of it, make it cost #b0. NL #gUsable #gonce #gper #gcombat.

theAya:Wing.NAME: Wing
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #y3 #yFlight.

theAya:TenguMask.NAME: Tengu Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, stun all enemies.

theAya:Newspaper.NAME: Newspaper
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 random #ySnapshot.
